projectGridLines.title: CE-Technology team deep learning/machine learning
projectGridLines.description:
11 months internship

Skill sets: Interest and experience in deep learning/machine learning (through project-work or summer internships)

Traits expectation: Bachelors/ Masters in Electronics & Communication Engineering / Electrical Engineering / Computer science / Information Technology from a reputed college / university, due to graduate in 2025. Overall, 70% in academics.

Knowledge of digital electronics, VLSI, microprocessor architecture is a plus.
